description: The sip MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration provides a powerful way to automate and manage Solana token swaps directly through an intelligent agent or system. It essentially turns complex blockchain interactions into easily callable "tools" within your MCP server.

tools.name: executeSolanaSwap
tools.description: Execute a token swap on the Solana, buying one token with another, or selling a token for USDC.

amount.description: The quantity of the inputMint token to swap, in its smallest unit (e.g., 2,000,000 for 2 USDC because USDC has 6 decimals).

inputMint.description: The mint address of the token you are selling/spending (e.g., 'EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v' for USDC).

outputMint.description: The mint address of the token you want to buy/receive. If this is 'EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v' (USDC), it indicates selling 'inputMint' for USDC.

tools.name: searchTokens
tools.description: Searches for cryptocurrency tokens by keyword and optional blockchain chain. Defaults to Solana if no chain is specified. Return the mint addresses

chain.description: The blockchain chain to filter by (e.g., 'ethereum', 'bsc', 'solana'). Defaults to 'solana'.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for (token symbol).

privateKey.description: Solana private key for transaction signing (loaded from environment).
